text:
@TheDemCoalition @AngelAm35528510 @TheAtlantic @realDonaldTrump Why am I fighting the COVID19 related death that was put on my father's death certificate? He tested negative for COVID and died of the complications of pneumonia from the flu

It's no wonder we have 29% of the COVID19 deaths. The government is paying hospitals and drs. for each
